Title: Relates to the mitigation of the severity of climate change; repealer
Summary: Relates to the mitigation of the severity of climate change; requires the state to create a binding plan for achieving 100 percent fossil fuel free electricity generation by 2030, if practicable, but no later than 2040.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to the mitigation of the severity of climate change; and to repeal certain provisions of the energy law relating thereto
